channel.title: iree on Lei.Chat()
channel.description: Recent content in iree on Lei.Chat()

item.title: Leaving Google
item.description: Time flies—almost 9 years have passed since I joined Google. Now the time has come for me to leave and move on. While here, I’m super lucky to mostly work on open source projects that I can publicly talk about. So at the end of my tenure with Google, I’d like to reflect and summarize the incredible journey, which I am super grateful for and thoroughly enjoyed, before I forget some details.

item.title: Single-node ML Runtime Foundation
item.description: Previous blog posts overviewed the MLIR dialect hierarchy for kernel code generation (CodeGen) and zoomed in on the Linalg and Vector dialects among them. Now I will switch to discuss the runtime side a bit, in order to provide a holistic view of MLIR-based machine learning (ML) compilers. This one touches the foundation and basics, including the target landscape, runtime requirements and designs to meet thereof.
